description: New restrictions in the Spanish capital come as Europe braces itself for a second wave of infections.
title: Covid-19: Lockdown in parts of Madrid amid virus spike
title_page: Covid-19: Lockdown in parts of Madrid amid virus spike - BBC News
maintext: The World Health Organization (WHO) has warned of the perils as people move indoors. "There is a lot of work to do in order to avoid amplification events, drive down transmission of this epidemic, protect the opening of schools and protect the most vulnerable in our society," Dr Mike Ryan, the head of the WHO's health emergencies programme, said.
